## Question 1: Stable distribution

Q1: 
```{r 1.1}
fx <- function(x, c){
  f <- c * (sqrt(2*pi)^-1) * exp(1)^(-c^2 / (2*x)) * x^(-3 / 2)
  return(f)
}

fpx <- function(x, Tmin, alpha){
  fp <- ((alpha - 1) / Tmin) * (x / Tmin)^(-alpha) 
  return(fp)
}
```

```{r}
fx1 <- \(x) fx(x, 1)
fpx1 <- \(x) fpx(x, 1, 2)

curve(fx1, xlim = c(0,10), ylim = c(0,3), xlab = "x", ylab = "y")
curve(fpx1, add = TRUE, col = "red")
text(x = 5, y  = c(0.6, 1), labels = c("f(x), c=1", "fp(x), Tmin=1, alpha=2"), col = c("black", "red"))

```
